import React, { useState } from "react"; import { LogoFull } from "../../assets/images/Logo"; const Navbar = () => { const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false); const toggleDarkMode = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default button behavior setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode); document.documentElement.classList.toggle("dark"); }; const navItems = [ { name: "Home", path: "/", icon: ( ), }, { name: "Shop", path: "/shop", icon: ( ), }, { name: "About", path: "/about", icon: ( ), }, { name: "Contact", path: "/contact", icon: ( ), }, ]; return (
{/* Logo Section */}
{/* Desktop Navigation with updated fonts */}
{navItems.map((item) => ( {item.icon} {item.name} ))}
{/* Desktop Buttons with updated fonts */}
Login Sign Up
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Menu Dropdown */}
{navItems.map((item) => ( {item.icon} {item.name} ))}
Login Sign Up
); }; export default Navbar;
